short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI-Powered Browser Assistant for Smarter Browsing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Popai is a powerful browser extension that combines AI chat capabilities with versatile productivity tools, designed to enhance your daily browsing and work efficiency. Chat with Claude 3.5 Sonnet model anytime, anywhere, and access a comprehensive repository of AI-powered tools to meet your various needs. Whether you need content generation, data analysis, or custom solutions, Popai delivers precise and professional results.

Experience seamless integration with your workflow through instant hotkey access and flexible window mode that preserves your original page layout. Set up tasks and let Popai run in the background while you focus on other work. From quick AI conversations to complex data processing, Popai is your intelligent companion for smarter, more efficient browsing.
